title: Technical Project Manager
description:
Brinner du för att leverera tekniska lösningar och har erfarenhet av den tekniska nedbrytningen av projekt och ett engagemang för att bidra till Sveriges försvarsförmåga? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

 Din nya utmaning
   

  

 Som
 **Teknisk Projektledare** 
 hos MilDef blir du en nyckelperson i våra projekt. Du ansvarar för att bryta ner tekniska helheter i hanterbara delar och för att leverera interna tekniska resultat av hög kvalitet. Rollen innebär nära samarbete med både kund och interna utvecklingsteam, där du omsätter kundens behov till tydliga krav och säkerställer att lösningarna fungerar som en helhet.
   

  

 Du får en ledande roll i projektens tekniska genomförande och blir MilDefs representant gentemot kundens projektorganisation. Här får du möjlighet att bidra med din tekniska expertis i en miljö som präglas av innovation, samarbete och försvarsnytta.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
* Leda den tekniska nedbrytningen av våra integrationsprojekt.
* Säkerställa kvalitet på och leverera interna tekniska resultat, inklusive att:
* förstå och analysera kundens tekniska behov
* översätta behoven till krav för systemutvecklingsteamen
* granska och verifiera att interna leveranser passar in i den totala lösningen
* Agera teknisk ledare och garantera att kundens behov tillgodoses.
* Vara projektens kontaktperson internt och externt i tekniska frågor
* Vara MilDefs ansikte utåt när det gäller vår systemutvecklingsmetodik
* Ansvara för den tekniska helhetslösningen i ett eller flera projekt


 Det här bidrar du med
   

  

* Du har en universitetsutbildning inom teknik, datavetenskap eller liknande tekniskt område.
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av systemintegration eller närliggande tekniska områden.
* Dokumenterad förmåga att definiera och utvärdera tekniska krav och lösningar i komplexa miljöer.
* Goda muntliga och skriftliga kommunikativa färdigheter i både svenska och engelska.
* Erfarenhet av tvärfunktionellt samarbete
* God vana av att använda Microsoft Office-verktyg för dokumentation och presentationer.


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av arbete i försvarsrelaterade projekt eller med kunder som Försvarsmakten eller FMV.
   

  

 Våra uppdrag kräver att du måste vara svensk medborgare och klarar vår säkerhetsprövning.
   

  

**Varför MilDef**
 På MilDef får du arbeta i en engagerad och stöttande miljö där dina idéer och insatser värdesätts. Du kommer att ha möjligheter till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling samt arbeta i en teamorienterad miljö som främjar innovation och samarbete.
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder dig
   

  

* En engagerande och utvecklande roll i ett ledande företag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med projekt som bidrar till nationell säkerhet och försvar.
* En samarbetsvillig och stöttande arbetsmiljö med engagerade kollegor.
* Kollektivavtal med bra försäkringar.
* Friskvårdsbidrag.
* Regelbundna hälsoundersökningar.
* Happiness team som ordnar med roliga och personalvårdande aktiviteter.
* En arbetsplats i helt nybyggda lokaler i Rosersberg.


 Ansökan
   

  

 Om du är en motiverad och erfaren teknisk projektledare som söker en spännande möjlighet att växa och göra skillnad, vill vi gärna höra från dig. Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt innovativa team på MilDef!
   

  

 Läs mer om oss på MilDef.com. För mer information om tjänsten, kontakta gärna Viktor Attoff, Head of Projects and Solutions, på viktor.attoff@mildef.com
   

  

 Vi jobbar med löpande urval. Sista ansökningsdag är 19 oktober 2025.
   

  

**MilDef - WE ARMOR IT.**
*MilDef is a global systems integrator and full-spectrum provider specializing in rugged IT for military, government and critical infrastructure sectors. MilDef provides hardware, software, and services that shield and protect critical information streams and systems, when and where the stakes are the highest. MilDef’s products are sold to more than 200 customers through companies in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Switzerland, the United States and Australia, and through partner networks in more than 40 countries. MilDef was founded in 1997 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm since 2021.*
**We kindly decline contact from advertising and recruitment sales.**

title: IT&OT-chef till SFAB
company_industry: Business Consulting and Services and Executive Offices
description:
Vill du bli vår nya IT&OT-chef och vara med på en spännande utvecklingsresa? Har du ett starkt intresse för ledarskap, IT och OT? Då är du rätt person för oss! Välkommen med din ansökan.
   

  

 SFAB spelar en nyckelroll i den cirkulära ekonomin genom att erbjuda klimatsmarta och pålitliga energilösningar som främjar hållbar samhällsutveckling. Vi är den naturliga energipartnern i Huddinge, Botkyrka och Salems kommuner - en av Sveriges mest expansiva regioner. När Huddinge, Botkyrka och Salem växer behövs energisystem som kan möta det växande behovet av värme och kyla. Det är sådana system vi skapar. Med våra resurssmarta lösningar möter vi det växande behovet av värme och kyla i både bostäder och på arbetsplatser, alltid med omtanke om kunden, klimatet och samhället.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som IT&OT-chef blir du en del av en resa där vi satsar på digitalisering, AI och cybersäkerhet. Rollen innebär ansvar för den strategiska utvecklingen av IT&OT-miljön, förvaltning av våra verksamhetssystem och att skapa tekniska förutsättningar för att ta nästa steg i vår digitala utveckling. Du har det yttersta ansvaret för vår IT&OT-avdelning och rapporterar direkt till vd.
   

  

 Du leder ett team på fyra personer, driver det dagliga arbetet och coachar medarbetarna framåt. I rollen ingår även nära samarbete med verksamheten i olika projekt samt många kontaktytor både internt och externt.
   

  

 Då rollen är bred och utmanande ser vi att du tycker om att arbeta med varierande arbetsuppgifter, både operativt och strategiskt, samt har ett flexibelt tänk som passar i en föränderlig miljö och en expanderande verksamhet.
   

  

**Du kommer i din roll som IT-chef att:**
* Ansvara för strategisk utveckling av IT&OT-miljö samt teknisk informations- och cybersäkerhet
* Äga och utveckla IT&OT:s projektportfölj
* Skapa tekniska förutsättningar för AI och digitalisering samt hålla ihop den strategiska förvaltningen av våra verksamhetssystem
* Ansvara för budget och leverantörsstyrning
* Ha personalansvar för avdelningens medarbetare
* Bevaka teknikutvecklingen inom fjärrvärmebranschen
* Ingå i SFAB:s ledningsgrupp och vara delaktig i affärsplanearbetet


**För att trivas och prestera i rollen ser vi att du har:**
* Relevant akademisk utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Flerårig chefserfarenhet med personalansvar och erfarenhet av att arbeta i ledningsgrupp
* Bred kompetens inom IT&OT-området och trivs i en varierad ledarroll
* Erfarenhet av OT, SCADA-system och teknisk datainsamling
* Erfarenhet av att leda en beställarorganisation i en outsourcad IT&OT-driftmiljö
* Kunskap om ITIL samt informations- och cybersäkerhet
* Förmåga att se helheten i en verksamhet och förstå samband mellan olika processer och system
* Vana av och gillar att samarbeta med leverantörer och andra intressenter
* Vilja och drivkraft att skapa framgång i en miljö med högt resultat- och kundfokus


 Du uttrycker dig väl på svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet från energisektorn, infrastruktur eller processindustri, alternativt en annan samhällskritisk verksamhet.
   

  

 Som person är du tydlig i ditt ledarskap, engagerad och kommunikativ. Du gillar att driva förändringar och förbättringar, är serviceinriktad och har ett strategiskt förhållningssätt. Du tar initiativ och gillar varierande arbetsuppgifter. Vidare är du analytisk, ansvarstagande och prestigelös. Vi tror att du ständigt vill lära dig nya saker och utforska teknikens möjligheter.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder:** 
 Här får du vara med och forma framtidens smarta energisamhälle. Du får ett spännande arbete i en organisation där miljö och utveckling står i fokus. Vi erbjuder flera olika förmåner t ex gym på arbetsplatsen, arbetstidsförkortning, attraktivt friskvårdsbidrag, lunchförmån, regelbundna hälsokontroller samt ett förmånligt pensionsavtal och en aktiv personalklubb. Vi vet att våra medarbetare är nyckeln till framgång och nöjda kunder, därför arbetar vi medvetet för att vara en stimulerande och ansvarstagande arbetsplats, där kompetensutveckling och balans i livet är viktiga delar. Mångfald och jämställdhet hjälper oss att utvecklas och vi arbetar aktivt med hälsa och friskvård. Läs gärna mer på https://rekrytering.sfab.se/
   

  

**Kontakt och ansökan:** 
 SFAB arbetar inom samhällskritisk verksamhet och rekryteringsprocessen innehåller bakgrundskontroll och säkerhetsintervju.
   

  

 Kontakta gärna Carina Eyoma på 073-086 22 75 alt carina.eyoma@se.experis.com. Vi arbetar med löpande urval så skicka in din ansökan omgående.

title: Field SW Support Service Specialist
company_industry: Hospitals and Health Care, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Software Development
description:
At
 **Elekta** 
 , we are united by a clear purpose:
 **to improve, prolong and save lives** 
 . Our advanced oncology and radiotherapy software solutions are used globally to treat cancer and brain disorders. Now, we’re looking for a
 **Field Software Support Specialist** 
 to join our high-performing team – someone who thrives in dynamic environments and is passionate about supporting technology that truly matters.
   

  

 As a
 **Field Software Support Specialist** 
 , you will serve as the central point of contact for service-related matters concerning Elekta software and third-party integrations within your region. You’ll manage and resolve technical issues in complex clinical IT environments, deliver first-level training, and ensure outstanding customer satisfaction through proactive and responsive support.
   

  

**What You’ll Do At Elekta**
* Act as the primary contact for customers on all service-related software issues.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues in Windows Server and SQL-based environments (remote & on-site)
* Proactively monitor systems and perform preventative support.
* Handle technical inquiries via phone and manage prioritization and planning of service tasks.
* Document incidents, actions, and resolutions per Elekta and local compliance standards.
* Communicate clearly with both internal teams and external stakeholders.
* Escalate complex issues and ensure timely resolution
* Provide first-level software training to local hardware service teams.
* Champion customer satisfaction and propose improvements
* Maintain ongoing dialogue with Sales and Service Management regarding customer insights.


**What You Bring**
* Completed studies in a field of information technology or similar engineering sciences.
* Experience with troubleshooting Windows client and server operating systems, virtualization and remote access tools, Citrix, networking configuration, troubleshooting, and Microsoft SQL installation/configuration is essential.
* Experience in medical imaging, linear accelerators and/or clinical use of radiotherapy products is desirable.
* Experience in a support environment is desirable.
* Excellent knowledge of local language and good knowledge of English, both written and spoken.
* Strong analytical skills with an excellent feel for dynamically changing situations and priorities.
* Interest and curiosity in acquiring knowledge independently.
* Strong communication skills and enjoy interacting with people.
* High degree of self-organization, ability to work in a team and personal responsibility
* Exceptional self-motivation and flexibility.
* Able to travel up to 20% in the assigned territory.


**We encourage you to apply even if you don’t meet every requirement—your unique skills and experiences might be exactly what we're looking for!**
**Why should you join Elekta?**
 In this role, you will work for a higher purpose; hope for everyone dealing with cancer, and for everyone regardless of where in the world, to have access to the best cancer care. You will be part of our international innovative team and given the opportunity to learn and develop.
   

  

**Hiring process**
 We are looking forward to hearing from you! Apply by submitting your application and resumé in English, via the “Apply” button. Please note that we do not accept applications by e-mail.
   

  

**Your Elekta contact**
 For questions, please contact the responsible Global Talent Acquisition Partner, Nidhi Pousette, nidhi.pousette@elekta.com.
   

  

**We are an equal opportunity employer**
 We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other status protected by law in the locations where Elekta operates.
   

  

**About Elekta**
 Here at Elekta, you will make a difference. We are a MedTech company that provides software and hardware to hospitals and clinics all over the world.
   

  

 We have a responsibility toward our partners and customers to deliver solutions in a secure and sustainable way. Both when it comes to financial and environmental matters, but also for our employees to feel that they bring value, wherever in the organization they may work

title: Information Architect
description:
**I** 
**nformationsarkitekter till B3** 
**Visab Consulting**
 Hos B3 Visab Consulting stödjer vi finansindustrins utveckling i den digitala ekonomin. Vi söker nu fler engagerade informationsarkitekter som vill vara med och bidra till en samhällskritisk bransch. Med över 40 års erfarenhet har vi byggt långsiktiga relationer med ledande aktörer inom bank och försäkring, och vår expertis gör oss även till en attraktiv partner för snabbväxande företag.
   

  

**Om rollen** 
 Som informationsarkitekt hos oss får du arbeta i varierande uppdrag där du hjälper kunder att utveckla och implementera robust informationsarkitektur. Du kommer att:
   

  

* Skapa riktlinjer och standarder för informationsarkitekturens struktur.
* Sätta upp processer för att hantera och vidareutveckla informationsflöden.
* Säkerställa att rätt information når rätt personer vid rätt tidpunkt.
* Arbeta med datalagring, tillgänglighet och säkerhet för att förhindra obehörig åtkomst och dataförluster.


 Vi tror att framgång bygger på samarbete och kunskapsdelning och vi ser gärna att du är en lagspelare som uppskattar att arbeta prestigelöst och flexibelt.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet som informationsarkitekt eller enterprisearkitekt, med fokus på informationsstruktur.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet från bank- eller försäkringssektorn.
* Tidigare erfarenhet som konsult.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Certifieringar inom relevanta områden är meriterande, liksom erfarenhet som verksamhetsarkitekt.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv och flexibel lönemodell.
* Möjlighet att påverka dina arbetstider och arbetsplats.
* Tillgång till utbildningar och certifieringar för din professionella utveckling.
* En stark wellness-satsning genom Team B3, som främjar både hälsa och arbetsglädje.


**Varför B3** 
 Visab? Vi är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Hos oss får du det bästa av två världar: kraften från ett stort bolag och den personliga samhörigheten från ett mindre. Vi är stolta över att ha blivit erkända som "Årets Karriärföretag" och av "Great Place to Work". Våra medarbetare pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetsmiljön där olikheter välkomnas, och stoltheten över att bidra till både kunders framgång och samhället i stort. Vi samarbetar med initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub och Pink Programming för att göra skillnad.
   

  

**Kontakt** 
 :
   

  

 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Ansök nu! Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Lidia Hagos (lidia.hagos@b3.se) eller konsultchef Hanna Skoog (+4670-260 12 65).

title: Founding Engineer - AI x Music
description:
Founding Frontend / Backend / Data Engineers — AI Music (Onsite, Stockholm)
 
**TL;DR** 
 – We’re seeking exceptional
 **Founding Frontend, Backend and Data Engineers** 
 to build the next generation of AI-powered music experiences for businesses. You’ll help design and scale the core systems that bring intelligence, personalization, and creativity into the world’s sound environments.
 



  




 Why join?
 
 We’re reimagining how businesses use music — blending
 **artistic intelligence with machine intelligence** 
 . Our AI generates and curates perfectly tailored soundtracks that adapt to brand identity, customer mood, and context in real time.
 



 We’re an early-stage company headquartered in
 **Stockholm** 
 , and we’re assembling a founding team that thrives at the intersection of
 **AI, data, and music** 
 . Founders are serial entrepreneurs who had raised venture capital, build an international customer list and exited companies before. With previous experience scaling companies like Spotify, Wolt & Doordash. Even though we're in Stealth mode, we've attracted founding by top tech investors such as Vercel's Founder & CEO, Guillermo Rauch.
 



 This is a unique opportunity to shape both
 **the product and the company** 
 — from architecture to culture.
 



 We value:
 


* High ownership and creativity
* Entrepreneurial problem-solving
* Craftsmanship, pragmatism, and speed
* A love for music, technology, and real-world impact



  




 What we’re looking for
 * **3+ years** 
 designing, building & scaling frontend and/or backend systems for production products
* A strong understanding of modern API design
* Experience crafting beautiful user interfaces, and/or
 **data pipelines** 
 ,
 **audio processing** 
 , or
 **ML-driven systems**
* Deep understanding of
 **distributed systems** 
 , scalability, and performance optimization
* Proven ability to integrate backend and ML systems into delightful user experiences
* Strong product sense — you care about
 *what* 
 we build and
 *why* 
 , not just
 *how*



  




 What you’ll do
 * Architect, implement, and operate our frontend and/or backend, data, and ML infrastructure
* Design and/or integrate APIs and systems powering our real-time music personalization engine
* Work closely with ML, product, and creative teams to turn ideas into live experiences
* Define technical direction, standards, and the culture of the engineering org
* Help hire and mentor the next wave of engineers



  




 How we hire
 1. A short intro call
2. A technical conversation focused on systems design and problem-solving
3. A deep dive into your most impactful project
4. Meet the team in Stockholm and jam with us about the future of AI + music



  




 What we offer
 * Competitive salary
* Significant option stake for our founding engineering team
* A culture of excellence and continuous learning
* A chance to impact how billions of people interact with music



  




 About Your Application
 
 Please apply in
 **English** 
 — it’s our working language.
 



 We’re open to exceptional builders from all backgrounds, but this role is
 **onsite in Stockholm** 
 .
 


* Join us to build the
 **future of music for business.**

title: Business Development Representative, Digital Media, Nordics
description:
**Our Company**
 Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
   

  

 We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
   

  

**About Adobe**
 Adobe is changing the world through digital experiences. We empower everyone - from emerging artists to global brands - to design and deliver exceptional digital content. Our Digital Media (DMe) business helps individuals, teams, and enterprises unleash creativity and productivity with industry-leading tools like Creative Cloud, Acrobat, and Adobe Express.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 From the moment you wake up in the morning until you go to bed at night consider the media you consume, the adverts you see, the apps you use, the websites you browse and almost all of the shopping you do online throughout the day. Chances are that every single one of those interactions, every single one of those experiences, was touched by an Adobe product.
   

  

 We have a fantastic opportunity for a Business Development Representative (BDR) to join our Digital Media sales team in Stockholm
 *!*
 We’re looking for a high-energy, driven, and self-motivated individual. As a BDR, you will be the first point of contact for prospects, engaging with IT and C-level decision-makers across commercial sectors. You’ll play a meaningful role in generating pipeline through personalized outreach and account-based development strategies. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with a passion to succeed!
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Generate qualified pipeline through inbound and outbound prospecting via phone, video, email, and social channels.
* Research and identify key contacts within target accounts to initiate meaningful conversations.
* Build awareness and interest in Adobe’s Digital Media solutions (Creative Cloud, Adobe Acrobat Studio, Adobe Express, Adobe Sign, Firefly Services, etc.).
* Drive attendance to webinars and live events through targeted campaigns.
* Collaborate with Account Executives, Marketing, and Product teams to align messaging and strategy.
* Keep accurate records in CRM and contribute to pipeline progression and forecasting.
* Handle objections confidently and guide prospects through the qualification process.
* Participate in ongoing enablement sessions and contribute to team best practices.
* Maintain up-to-date knowledge of Adobe's competitive positioning in the marketplace.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Full fluency in Swedish and English.
* 1+ years’ experience in SaaS sales or business development, ideally with enterprise clients.
* Proven success in inbound/outbound prospecting and building relationships across organizational levels.
* Skilled in account planning, opportunity qualification, and objection handling.
* Strong communicator with confident phone, writing, and presentation skills.
* Quick learner able to translate complex business needs into solution plays.
* Proficient in tools like Salesforce CRM, Microsoft Dynamics, Outreach, Lusha, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and MS Office or similar.
* Self-starter with resilience, independence, and a collaborative attitude.
* Comfortable working cross-functionally with sales, marketing, and solution teams.


 As our many awards will tell you, at Adobe you’ll be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized around the world. You’ll be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our unique Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely. If you’re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you. Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog, https://blog.adobe.com/en/topics/adobe-life and explore the fantastic benefits we offer at Rewards.adobe.com.
   

  

 Adobe is an equal opportunity employer. We hire talented individuals, regardless of gender, race or colour, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We know that when our employees feel appreciated and included, they can be more creative, innovative and successful. This is what it means to be Adobe For All.
   

  

 We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours.
   

  

 Adobe is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law. Learn more.
   

  

 Adobe aims to make Adobe.com accessible to any and all users. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation to navigate our website or complete the application process, email accommodations@adobe.com or call (408) 536-3015.

title: Engineering Director, Platform
description:
Do you want to help us unleash the secret to how happy employees create a happy business? We are an innovative, agile, and continuously growing modern tech company on a path to improving the work lives of millions around the world.
   

  

**We develop workforce management solutions** 
 - software that makes scheduling and time reporting more smooth and more flexible for almost a million users worldwide!
   

  

****We value passion, quality, innovation, trust, and collaboration** 
 .** 
 You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas, and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Are you curious and ready to take the first steps on an awesome journey and make magic happen with us? As a member of Quinyx, you will be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace where everyone is allowed to be themselves and thrive.
   

  

*We have a hybrid working set up and therefore you will be required to attend our Stockholm office minimum twice per week.*
**About The Role**
 As Engineering Director, Platform , you'll lead the engineering function within a key product area, reporting directly to the CTO and working closely with the Product Director. Together, you'll shape the roadmap, define strategy, and ensure delivery excellence aligned with Quinyx's vision.
   

  

 You'll oversee multiple multidisciplinary delivery teams , including Product Managers, Engineers, QA, and Designers, focusing on driving engineering excellence and platform scalability. Managing and mentoring 25-35 engineers across teams and locations, you'll foster collaboration, cohesion, and technical leadership.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Serve as a member of the R&D Senior Management Team (SMT) , helping shape and review product proposals to align with company-wide goals.
* Lead platform engineering strategy , ensuring speed, security, and robustness across infrastructure and product delivery.
* Own infrastructure design, scalability, reliability, and security , with strong cost control and performance optimization of cloud resources.
* Define and implement best practices, KPIs, and procedural strategies for cross-team efficiency and high-quality output.
* Collaborate with other Engineering Directors to plan resources, resolve technical challenges , and align on organizational priorities.
* Manage budgeting, resourcing, and strategic planning for a 25-person department of Architects, Backend, DevOps, and QA engineers across multiple offices.
* Partner with the Commercial and M&A teams on acquisition activities, including technical due diligence, compliance, and integration planning.


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* Excellent communicator and collaborator, able to engage across all organizational levels.
* Former hands-on Platform Engineer (DevOps or SRE background preferred).
* Proven leadership and mentoring skills , with experience managing multiple teams and senior engineers.
* Strategic mindset with the ability to balance short-term delivery and long-term vision .
* Creative and innovative — leveraging emerging technologies and best practices to improve processes.
* Strong judgement, decision-making, and conflict resolution skills.
* Ability to align departmental goals with company strategy and ensure measurable success through KPIs.


**What is it for you?**
 We promote and encourage a healthy lifestyle with flexible work hours and latest tools, enhanced vacation allowance, gym membership contribution, and last but not least, you will have the chance to participate in our well-known yearly ugly Xmas sweater competition!
   

  

**Life at Quinyx**
 We are an innovative, agile and continuously growing modern tech company. We value passion, creativity, quality and simplicity. You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Our global team, of 30 nationalities, have fun together whether it is during a typical Swedish Fika, workshop, going for a run with a colleague or spending time together during our regular after-work socials. We have built a family atmosphere here at Quinyx and are committed to share knowledge and support one another!
   

  

**Want to join the family?**
 At Quinyx, we provide equal employment opportunities and we strive to have an inclusive and diverse value-driven culture. All applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, disability or Veteran status.
   

  

**Happy Workforce, Happy Business!**
*All candidates are subject to background checks.*

title: Sales Project Manager
description:
**About Mediaplanet**
 We Create Impact!
   

  

 Mediaplanet is a world leader in content marketing, creating powerful campaigns together with 15,000+ clients globally. We make branding easy by managing the entire value chain – from concept and production to distribution and collaborations with influencers and world-renowned media houses. As part of Caybon, we have 12 offices across Europe and North America.
   

  

***We are now looking for a Sales Project Manager***
**About The Role**
 As a Sales Project Manager in Sweden, you will own your campaign and topic from the idea stage all the way to release date.
   

  

 You will start every quarter with in-depth research about a relevant topic and current trends within a selected industry. You will identify the most important influencers and experts while securing the best possible distribution channels. When funding your campaign, you must pitch the campaign and the Mediaplanet products to the right clients.
   

  

 To be successful in the sales process, it is paramount that you have a thorough understanding of the client’s needs and that you are able to identify which products in our portfolio will match the expectations and goals for the client’s participation in the campaign. Whilst keeping a high pace and focus on bringing in revenue.
   

  

**Your Profile**
* You are curious and hungry to learn about Sales within the Media Industry
* High drive – Goal-oriented with high energy and thrives in a fast-paced environment.
* You like to work in a young and vibrant environment at an office in central Stockholm.
* You might have experience from a similar sales job and/or the media industry,
* A university degree is preferred but not required – we value the right mindset and experience over formal education.
* Fluency in Swedish is a must.


**Why Mediaplanet?**
 High Degree of Freedom & Impact - You have the opportunity to create impact for clients, yourself and the company.
   

  

 Work in an innovative environment where you can create unique campaigns and collaborations.
   

  

 We have a strong entrepreneurial culture and provide our employees with opportunities to grow and develop.
   

  

 Mediaplanet delivers top class content marketing campaigns together with 15 000+ clients globally. Since the start in Stockholm back in 2002, we have grown into the world’s leading content marketing group with 15 offices across Europe and the North Americas.

title: Co-Founder / Director of Marketing & Events
description:
About MÅNELLA
 



  





 MÅNELLA is a Scandinavian luxury lingerie and lifestyle maison that intertwines Nordic minimalism with lunar sensuality.
 



 Each piece is designed as an emotional object, where craftsmanship, femininity, and poetry converge.
 



  





 Our universe celebrates the rhythm of the moon, an eternal symbol of womanhood, softness, and transformation.
 



 From silk lingerie and robes to loungewear and accessories, MÅNELLA is creating a Maison of Cosmic Intimacy, where design becomes ritual and elegance becomes empowerment.
 



  





**⸻** 




  





 Our Vision
 



  





 “To awaken the modern woman’s inner serenity and sensuality — to make her feel as luminous and mysterious as the moon itself.”
 



  





**The Role — Marketing & Events Co-Founder** 




 We are seeking a visionary and emotionally intelligent
 **Co-Founder / Director of Marketing & Events** 
 to lead all
 **public-facing operations** 
 of MÅNELLA.
 



 This is not a traditional job — it is an invitation to
 **co-create a modern luxury brand from the ground up** 
 .
 



 You will build and manage the brand’s
 *external world* 
 : storytelling, visibility, and community — across digital media, influencer collaborations, and in-person events.
 



 Your leadership will shape how MÅNELLA is perceived, felt, and experienced globally.
 



  





  





**Compensation: This is an unpaid co-founder position during the pre-launch phase.** 




 Upon launch, you will receive 15
 **% of the net profit share** 
 , with the potential for long-term equity consideration after the first year.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**1️⃣ Brand Communication & Marketing Strategy** 




 Develop and execute marketing strategies aligned with MÅNELLA’s vision and creative direction.
 



 Create and manage campaign concepts, content calendars, and social media storytelling.
 



 Craft messaging that captures the brand’s tone —
 *elegant, poetic, and soulful* 
 .
 



 Coordinate marketing materials, PR releases, and influencer collaborations.
 



 Collaborate with Founder (Tong Xia) to ensure coherence between brand voice, imagery, and experience.
 



**2️⃣ Event Planning & Experiential Marketing** 




 Lead the conceptualization and execution of
 **MÅNELLA events** 
 — from launch soirées to intimate talks in partnership with femtech, healthtech, and wellness communities.
 



 Manage event logistics, guest lists, and brand partnerships.
 



 Ensure every event feels like an extension of MÅNELLA’s world — refined, emotional, sensory, and beautifully curated.
 



**3️⃣ Influencer, Media & Partnership Relations** 




 Build and maintain strong relationships with creators, editors, and collaborators in fashion, wellness, and tech spaces.
 



 Identify and secure strategic partnerships aligned with the brand’s aesthetic and mission.
 



 Manage PR giftings, influencer communications, and follow-ups to ensure meaningful brand placement.
 



**4️⃣ Social Media & Content Leadership** 




 Oversee all MÅNELLA social channels (Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, LinkedIn).
 



 Manage content creation, scheduling, and visual direction.
 



 Guide interns or freelancers to execute on-brand visuals and copy.
 



 Analyze content performance and refine strategies for growth and engagement.
 



**5️⃣ Team Management & Collaboration** 




 Recruit, onboard, and manage interns for marketing, PR, or event roles.
 



 Coordinate with designers, photographers, and agencies to maintain brand consistency.
 



 Work directly with the Founder to align creative and operational priorities.
 



**6️⃣ Performance, Growth & Profitability** 




 Track engagement metrics, audience growth, and event ROI.
 



 Present monthly updates on marketing performance and strategic outcomes.
 



 Optimize communication strategy for visibility and conversion after launch.
 



  





**What We’re Looking For** 




**TraitDescription** 




 ✦ Visionary ThinkerUnderstands luxury branding and emotional storytelling; sees beauty as strategy.
