title: Devops GCP
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

Join our fast-growing AI platform team as GCP DevOps Engineer. In this role you will develop capabilities for our AI Platforms to enable genAI use cases for various units.

 **Key Responsibilities:**


* Designing and provisioning cloud infrastructure on GCP using Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), including networking, IAM, and project structures.
* Implementing secure networking setups such as VPCs, subnets, firewalls, load balancers, and service meshes, ensuring private connectivity to GCP services.
* Managing access control and secrets by defining least-privilege IAM roles, service accounts, and secret rotation policies.
* Building and maintaining reusable CI/CD templates for applications, infrastructure, and ML pipelines using GitHub Actions.
* Enabling AI/ML workloads by provisioning services like Vertex AI,Agent builder, Model garden, Cloud run, GKE clusters, and GPU/TPU resources, and securing access to data sources.
* Setting up observability and reliability practices including logging, monitoring, alerting, and disaster recovery strategies.
* Providing developer enablement with self-service templates, clear documentation, and best practices for deploying applications and AI services.
* Perform root cause analysis to resolve issues
* Maintain production solutions to ensure high availability and performance
* Collaborate with other talented platform engineers, ML & AI engineers in the AI team to define best practices and ways of working
* Provide guidance to our users on how to make best use of the services we provide
* 

**What We Offer:**


* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Affärsutvecklande managementkonsult
description:
**Vi söker dig som vill vara med och bygga och utveckla vår verksamhet**.


Det är viktigt att du ser helheten och förstår vad som krävs för att få ihop teknik, arbetssätt och människor för att skapa största möjliga nytta för våra kunder.


Du vet vad IT Service Management och förändringsledning handlar om och vad som krävs för att lyckas i rollen som konsult. Du ogillar ineffektivitet och vill som konsult göra verklig skillnad.


Utöver detta förväntas du aktivt bidra till försäljning och affärsutveckling, genom att identifiera nya möjligheter, bygga relationer och forma erbjudanden som skapar värde. Du har erfarenhet av och ett genuint intresse för affärsdrivna initiativ och kunddialoger.


Om detta stämmer – då har du en roll här på BiTA!

**Hos oss på BiTA**


Hos BiTA är du en viktig person. Vi vill därför säkerställa att du har attraktiva förmåner, flexibla arbetstider och rätt arbetsverktyg – allt på en arbetsplats mitt i city med kollegor och chefer som delar sunda värderingar.

**Lite om uppdragen**


Våra uppdrag handlar ofta om att utveckla och implementera en vinnande strategi, tjänst, process, organisation eller kultur i en verksamhet. Ytterst handlar det om verksamhetsutveckling och förändringsledning åt medelstora företag, kommuner, regioner och myndigheter.

**Vilka är BiTA?**


På BiTA hittar du kollegor med många olikheter, men gemensamt för oss alla är ett stort hjärta, ett skarpt intellekt och passion för att förenkla våra kunders förändringar. Vi är skickliga på att förstå, förklara och stötta i digitalisering och verksamhetsutveckling.


Vi erbjuder IT-driven verksamhetsutveckling till offentliga och privata verksamheter som vill göra skillnad och samtidigt förbättra sin förmåga att skapa intern effektivitet och leverera kundnytta – vi kallar det för Operativ Excellens.


Vi är inte perfekta, långt ifrån. Men vi anstränger oss varje dag att göra våra kunder och oss själva bättre än vi var igår. Vi vill ha nya kollegor som tillsammans med oss utvecklar verksamheten och delar vår vision att förenkla förändring.

**Vem är du?**


Vi tror att du tidigare har arbetat med att effektivisera verksamhetsanpassad IT – från att bygga strukturer och processer till att arbeta med ledarskap, kulturutveckling och kommunikation.


Du ska kunna driva förändringsarbete i syfte att få ihop människa, arbetssätt och system. Du är certifierad i ITIL och andra etablerade ramverk som exempelvis DevOps, pm3 eller ISO/IEC 27001 – kort sagt ramverk som hjälper våra kunder att bygga strukturer och processer som är funktionella, enkla och värdeskapande.


Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av projekt inom compliance, med fokus på regelefterlevnad, intern styrning och riskhantering.


Det är också av stor vikt att du har förmågan att bidra till affärsutveckling och försäljning i uppdragen. Du trivs i kunddialoger, kan identifiera behov och omsätta dem till värdeskapande lösningar, och motiveras av att skapa resultat både för kunder och för verksamheten.

**Ansökningstid**


Vill du börja en ny resa som garanterat kommer leda till nya karriärmöjligheter? Skicka in ditt CV tillsammans med några kreativa rader som förklarar varför du är den vi söker.


Urval sker löpande, så vänta inte med att höra av dig. Kontakta oss gärna eller besök vår webbsida www.bita.eu om du vill veta mer om våra tjänster eller har frågor.

**Vi gör skillnad. Vi förenklar förändring. Vi levererar Operativ Excellens!**

title: Krav/Testare
description:
**Krav/Testare – Agilt utvecklingsteam**

**Rollbeskrivning**  

Vi söker en konsult med kompetens inom kravhantering och test för ett uppdrag i ett agilt utvecklingsteam. Uppdraget innebär att bidra genom hela utvecklingskedjan – från kravställning och analys till implementation och test – med fokus på kvalitet och samarbete.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Delta i kravanalys, testdesign och kvalitetssäkring genom hela utvecklingsprocessen.
* Arbeta med digitalisering av fullmakter och lösningar för identitet, autentisering och auktorisering.
* Genomföra tester av elektroniska underskrifter och relaterade system för myndigheter och kommuner.
* Utföra testautomatisering, API-testning, tillgänglighetstester samt utforskande tester.
* Samarbeta nära utvecklare och produktägare i ett agilt team med korta feedbackloopar.

**Krav**

* Erfarenhet av testautomatisering i Cypress.
* Erfarenhet av kodhantering och testarbete i DevOps-miljö med GitLab och pipelines.
* Förmåga att utveckla testskript i Visual Studio Code.
* Erfarenhet av API-testning.
* Erfarenhet av tillgänglighetstester enligt WCAG.
* Erfarenhet av manuella och utforskande tester.

**Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt, gärna enligt SAFe.
* Kunskap om verktygen Jira och Confluence.
* Erfarenhet av GitLab, Visual Studio Code och Cypress.
* Erfarenhet av Insomnia för API-testning.
* Erfarenhet av Figma eller Balsamiq för gränssnittsarbete.

**Start:** 2026-01-01  

**Längd:** Till 2026-12-31  

**Plats:** Sundsvall (hybrid eller enligt överenskommelse)

**Om Rasulson Consulting**  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med både etablerade teknikbolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för dig som vill utvecklas inom digitalisering och IT. Genom vår djupa tekniska kompetens och vårt omfattande nätverk matchar vi rätt konsult med rätt uppdrag – snabbt och träffsäkert. Hos oss får du personlig rådgivning, kontinuerlig återkoppling och möjlighet att ta nästa steg i din karriär.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Azure
* Jenkins / Jenkins X
* Gitlab
* Artifactory
* Ansible
* CI /CD
* Containers
 **Sista ansökningdatum:** 24-10-2025

 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Scrum Master
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a relevant field
* Proficiency in English (spoken and written)
* Proven experience as a Scrum Master, preferably in hardware-related projects
* Strong understanding of Agile principles and the Scrum framework
* Excellent facilitation and communication skills
* Self-driven, team-oriented, with strong leadership qualities
* Open to continuous learning and personal development

  

**Application deadline:** 15-10-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Business Analyst
description:
At Evitec Solutions, we create innovative IT solutions and advisory services that support our customers' success across industries. With over 300 professionals across the Nordics, we specialize in providing business-critical software for the finance and insurance sectors. Our solutions streamline complex processes, enabling smarter decisions and delivering long-term value.


We are seeking a Business Analyst to join our team in Sweden to support our journey with our product, Evitec Solutions Life, in Sweden. Evitec Solutions Life is a complete and flexible policy administration system for life insurance which easily adapts to changing business requirements and needs.


As a Business Analyst, you are methodical in your requirements management work, and you are used to work in the customer interface. You have experience in defining and specifying software requirements. If you're interested, please apply. We offer a position with many exciting challenges and great variety, working within a fantastic cross-Nordic team of experts.

 **About Evitec Solutions Life**

Evitec Solutions Life is an insurance IT software (ES Life) designed for life insurers offering savings, pension and personal life risk products. The software provides a complete, efficient, and scalable policy administration solution. This highly automated and future-proof insurance platform handles policy sales, lifecycle management, and claims processing securely and reliably. It is ideal for life and pension insurance companies seeking a modern system.

 **At Evitec Solutions, You Shape the Future of the Financial Sector**


We offer an inspiring work environment in a growing and successful organization where you will have opportunities for development. We value a work culture that promotes a balance between work and personal life, including options for hybrid work and flexible hours. Additionally, we foster a supportive work culture where everyone contributes, spreads joy and grows together. Moreover, we offer competitive salaries and benefits.

 **Who Are You?**


As a person, you are positive, curious, and unpretentious, and you are happy to share your knowledge. You need the ability to work with both holistic and detailed perspectives and can connect strategy with tactics. You are someone who gets things done.

 **To succeed in this role, you should have:**

* At least 2 years of experience as a Business Analyst, working at the intersection of business and IT
* Experience in specifying and writing software requirements
* Familiar with tools like Azure DevOps, JIRA and Confluence (or similar)
* The ability to network and collaborate with stakeholders at various levels
* A business-driven mindset, preferably with experience in financial industry life insurance
* Experience with agile environments and traditional project methodologies
* A pleasant and empathetic approach to teamwork and client collaboration
* Fluency in both Swedish and English, spoken and written

 **We also value if you have:**

* Previous experience with financial industry
* Previous experience working in the customer interface
* A desire to develop and learn new things
* An interest in long-term work with systems crucial to society

  

While flexibility is important to us, this position requires regular daily presence onsite at our office or customer locations to best serve our projects and clients.

 **Why join us?**  

We offer responsibility aligned with your expertise and ambitions, plus the freedom to grow your career—toward leadership, deep technical specialization, or customer experience excellence. At Evitec, every team member is an equal part of the team, with diverse opportunities to grow and do meaningful work. We get things done with a smile and a positive attitude. Truly.  

  

If you'd like to have more information about Evitec or the job before applying, you can contact Head of Engineering Sami Lehtisaari through email: (firstname.lastname@evitec.com).  

  

**Interested?**  

Make sure you put in your application latest 10.11.2025, we review applications on a rolling basis.

title: Devops GCP
description:
**About Justera Group**
 Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 Join our fast-growing AI platform team as GCP DevOps Engineer. In this role you will develop capabilities for our AI Platforms to enable genAI use cases for various units.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Designing and provisioning cloud infrastructure on GCP using Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), including networking, IAM, and project structures.
* Implementing secure networking setups such as VPCs, subnets, firewalls, load balancers, and service meshes, ensuring private connectivity to GCP services.
* Managing access control and secrets by defining least-privilege IAM roles, service accounts, and secret rotation policies.
* Building and maintaining reusable CI/CD templates for applications, infrastructure, and ML pipelines using GitHub Actions.
* Enabling AI/ML workloads by provisioning services like Vertex AI,Agent builder, Model garden, Cloud run, GKE clusters, and GPU/TPU resources, and securing access to data sources.
* Setting up observability and reliability practices including logging, monitoring, alerting, and disaster recovery strategies.
* Providing developer enablement with self-service templates, clear documentation, and best practices for deploying applications and AI services.
* Perform root cause analysis to resolve issues
* Maintain production solutions to ensure high availability and performance
* Collaborate with other talented platform engineers, ML & AI engineers in the AI team to define best practices and ways of working
* Provide guidance to our users on how to make best use of the services we provide


**What We Offer:**
* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Software Engineer - iOS
description:
**Why join us?**
 We’re on a mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. As the world-leader in assistive communication solutions, we empower our customers to express themselves, connect with the world, and live richer lives.
   

  

 At Tobii Dynavox, you can grow your career within a dynamic, global company that has a clear, impactful purpose - with the flexibility to also do what truly matters to you outside of work. What’s more, you’ll be part of a work culture where collaboration is the norm and individuality is welcomed.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you’ll have the power to innovate for good. You’ll see your ideas in use in new applications, work with the latest technology on leading platforms, and deliver meaningful solutions for our customers.
   

  

**About the Role:**
*We’re at an exciting stage in our journey—growing rapidly and expanding our Product & Development team in Stockholm to build a vibrant hub for innovation, product design, and technology. This is a unique opportunity to join a thriving organization where you can help shape the future of assistive communication, defining how we work and delivering impactful solutions for our users.*
*We are building a culture of empowered, collaborative teams who are passionate about helping individuals with disabilities find their voice and connect with the world. Our teams thrive on trust, collaboration, and a positive environment where everyone lead and contributes. We deeply understand the people we serve, empathize with their challenges, and use our expertise to make a real difference.*
 As a
 **Software Engineer – iOS** 
 you will join a cross-functional team that develops innovative mobile and desktop applications aimed at improving assistive communication. While your strong iOS background will be key in strengthening this area of the team, you will also contribute more broadly across our platforms and technologies. This is a role for someone who enjoys solving real-world problems through software and is motivated by building tools that make a difference in people’s lives.
   

  

 In this role, you will work with:
   

  

* Develop and maintain high-quality software across mobile and desktop platforms
* Contribute to the architecture and design of both current and upcoming products
* Bring iOS expertise to the team and help guide best practices in mobile development
* Write clean, efficient, and testable code
* Debug and troubleshoot issues across the stack
* Collaborate with developers, designers, and product managers in an agile environment
* Stay informed on relevant technologies and help evaluate new tools and approaches
* Support and contribute to CI/CD pipelines and testing efforts


**What We're Looking For:**
 We’re looking for someone who thrives in a collaborative environment and enjoys working closely with others to solve problems. You’re someone who communicates clearly, is open to learning, and can adapt comfortably as things evolve. Curiosity, a proactive mindset, and a supportive attitude are traits that help you succeed, not just in delivering high-quality code, but also in contributing to a healthy and effective team dynamic.
   

  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field
* 4+ years of professional experience in iOS development
* Solid understanding of Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, and the Apple ecosystem
* Experience working with iOS frameworks, APIs, and the App Store submission process
* Ability to guide others in mobile best practices and contribute to shared mobile architecture
* Broader software engineering experience, ideally including desktop or cross-platform development
* Experience with or openness to working in .NET/C# environments
* Familiarity with Xamarin and/or MAUI is a plus
* Comfortable working with CI/CD workflows, automated testing, and agile methodologies
* Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset


 Apply today!
   

  

 We believe in empowering individuals - including our own employees - to reach their full potential. So, if you want to change lives while growing your own career, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Engineering Director, Platform
description:
Do you want to help us unleash the secret to how happy employees create a happy business? We are an innovative, agile, and continuously growing modern tech company on a path to improving the work lives of millions around the world.
   

  

**We develop workforce management solutions** 
 - software that makes scheduling and time reporting more smooth and more flexible for almost a million users worldwide!
   

  

****We value passion, quality, innovation, trust, and collaboration** 
 .** 
 You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas, and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Are you curious and ready to take the first steps on an awesome journey and make magic happen with us? As a member of Quinyx, you will be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace where everyone is allowed to be themselves and thrive.
   

  

*We have a hybrid working set up and therefore you will be required to attend our Stockholm office minimum twice per week.*
**About The Role**
 As Engineering Director, Platform , you'll lead the engineering function within a key product area, reporting directly to the CTO and working closely with the Product Director. Together, you'll shape the roadmap, define strategy, and ensure delivery excellence aligned with Quinyx's vision.
   

  

 You'll oversee multiple multidisciplinary delivery teams , including Product Managers, Engineers, QA, and Designers, focusing on driving engineering excellence and platform scalability. Managing and mentoring 25-35 engineers across teams and locations, you'll foster collaboration, cohesion, and technical leadership.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Serve as a member of the R&D Senior Management Team (SMT) , helping shape and review product proposals to align with company-wide goals.
* Lead platform engineering strategy , ensuring speed, security, and robustness across infrastructure and product delivery.
* Own infrastructure design, scalability, reliability, and security , with strong cost control and performance optimization of cloud resources.
* Define and implement best practices, KPIs, and procedural strategies for cross-team efficiency and high-quality output.
* Collaborate with other Engineering Directors to plan resources, resolve technical challenges , and align on organizational priorities.
* Manage budgeting, resourcing, and strategic planning for a 25-person department of Architects, Backend, DevOps, and QA engineers across multiple offices.
* Partner with the Commercial and M&A teams on acquisition activities, including technical due diligence, compliance, and integration planning.


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* Excellent communicator and collaborator, able to engage across all organizational levels.
* Former hands-on Platform Engineer (DevOps or SRE background preferred).
* Proven leadership and mentoring skills , with experience managing multiple teams and senior engineers.
* Strategic mindset with the ability to balance short-term delivery and long-term vision .
* Creative and innovative — leveraging emerging technologies and best practices to improve processes.
* Strong judgement, decision-making, and conflict resolution skills.
* Ability to align departmental goals with company strategy and ensure measurable success through KPIs.


**What is it for you?**
 We promote and encourage a healthy lifestyle with flexible work hours and latest tools, enhanced vacation allowance, gym membership contribution, and last but not least, you will have the chance to participate in our well-known yearly ugly Xmas sweater competition!
   

  

**Life at Quinyx**
 We are an innovative, agile and continuously growing modern tech company. We value passion, creativity, quality and simplicity. You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Our global team, of 30 nationalities, have fun together whether it is during a typical Swedish Fika, workshop, going for a run with a colleague or spending time together during our regular after-work socials. We have built a family atmosphere here at Quinyx and are committed to share knowledge and support one another!
   

  

**Want to join the family?**
 At Quinyx, we provide equal employment opportunities and we strive to have an inclusive and diverse value-driven culture. All applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, disability or Veteran status.
   

  

**Happy Workforce, Happy Business!**
*All candidates are subject to background checks.*

title: Data Engineer
description:
Join us in building the backend that powers world-class creativity apps used by millions of people.
 

 Appostrophe is a Stockholm-based mobile app studio creating easy-to-use design tools that unlock people's creativity. Our flagship app SCRL is a top-ranked design tool for social media content creation, used and loved by millions worldwide. We're a small, ambitious team expanding our platform to the web, and we need a talented Backend Infrastructure Engineer to build the foundation that will power this growth.
 



 You'll be joining our data team to architect and build the backend systems that enable SCRL's expansion to the web, focusing on user accounts, subscription management, and cross-platform data synchronization, while at the same time strengthening our existing backend infrastructure which provides content to the millions of people using our iOS and Android app.
 



  





 What you will do
 


 Core Infrastructure & APIs
 



* Design and build robust account systems supporting, among others, email+OTP authentication and cross-platform user management.
* Develop and maintain RESTful APIs for user data, project storage, and subscription management.
* Maintain secure authentication flows across web and mobile platforms.
* Build scalable storage solutions for user projects and account data.
* Strengthen our content delivery backend that returns templates, stickers and other content to all our platforms (iOS, Android, Web).
* Ensure scalability and stability of our backend across all platforms and platform versions.
* Support AI service delivery to the apps, such as our template recommendation system to suggest the right templates for our users.




 Subscription & Payment Systems
 



* Architect subscription management systems integrating with an external service for web payments.
* Implement subscription syncing across iOS, Android, and web platforms.
* Build subscription status validation and premium feature access controls.
* Develop subscription plan management (upgrades, downgrades, cancellations).




 Data Security & Compliance
 



* Implement GDPR-compliant data handling including consent management, data takeout, and deletion requests.
* Ensure secure backup systems and data integrity across platforms.
* Build audit trails for subscription and account changes.
* Maintain data structure consistency across web and mobile platforms.




 Platform Integration & Scaling
 



* Develop backend endpoints for mobile app account integration.
* Build systems for potential third-party integrations (Instagram connectivity, etc.).
* Optimize database performance and query efficiency for millions of users.
* Implement monitoring, logging, and error reporting systems.



 You should have
 


 Technical Expertise
 



* Backend Languages
 
 : Strong proficiency in Javascript, Typescript, React, or similar.
* Database Design
 
 : Experience with both SQL and NoSQL databases, understanding of data modeling for user accounts and subscriptions.
* API Development
 
 : Proven experience building RESTful APIs and understanding of API security best practices.
* Cloud Infrastructure
 
 : Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and infrastructure as code.




 System Design & Architecture
 



* Scalable Systems
 
 : Experience building systems that handle millions of users and high-throughput scenarios.
* Payment Integration
 
 : Knowledge of payment processing, subscription billing, and financial data handling.
* Security
 
 : Understanding of authentication, authorization, data encryption, and GDPR compliance requirements.




 Product & Business Understanding
 



* Subscription Apps
 
 : Experience with or strong interest in subscription-based app businesses and freemium models.
* Cross-Platform Thinking
 
 : Understanding of the complexities of syncing data and subscriptions across web, iOS, and Android.
* Data-Driven Approach
 
 : Comfortable working with analytics and ensuring proper event tracking for business insights.




 Collaboration & Communication
 



* Team Player
 
 : Ability to work closely with data engineers, frontend developers, and product teams.
* Clear Communication
 
 : Can explain complex technical concepts to non-technical team members.
* Problem Solving
 
 : Self-motivated with strong analytical and debugging skills.



 We offer
 
* High Impact Role
 
 : Your backend infrastructure will power millions of users' creative projects.
* Technical Growth
 
 : Opportunity to architect systems from scratch and work with modern technologies.
* Startup Environment
 
 : Fast-paced decision making with direct impact on product direction.
* Strong Team
 
 : Work alongside experienced data and engineering professionals in central Stockholm.
* Competitive Package
 
 : Market-rate salary with opportunities for professional development.
* Creative Culture
 
 : Be part of a profitable company that values creativity and user experience.

title: Databricks Champion
description:
*At Capgemini, you’ll have the opportunity to shape your career in a way that suits you, supported by a community of experts who inspire and empower you. We believe in reimagining what’s possible - using technology to build a more sustainable, inclusive world. Our Insights & Data team is at the forefront of this mission, delivering end-to-end Data & AI solutions across industries. With over 800 specialists in the Nordics, we leverage strategic partnerships with Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks, and Snowflake to scale Data & Analytics in the Cloud. Here, your expertise and perspective matter - join us in driving innovation and transforming industries with cutting-edge data solutions!*
**Your role**
 We are now seeking a passionate and experienced
 **Databricks Expert or Champion** 
 to join our dynamic team in Stockholm or Gothenburg. In this role, you will play a key part in driving Capgemini’s data, analytics & AI strategy forward using the Databricks platform. You will work hands-on with the latest tools in data ingestion, ETL, orchestration, and machine learning, while also contributing to solution design, architecture, and customer engagement. This is a role for someone who thrives at the intersection of technology, strategy, and communication.
   

  

 Capgemini has a strong and close collaboration with Databricks and was named EMEA Partner of the Year 2024 – a recognition of our customer growth, joint engagements, and technical excellence. As part of our team, you’ll help strengthen this partnership and guide organizations in unlocking the full potential of the Databricks platform.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key part in:*
* Design and implement high-performance data pipelines using Databricks and Apache Spark
* Build and maintain secure data lakehouses and data warehouses in Azure
* Integrate AI/ML models into data pipelines using Databricks ML and Azure ML
* Lead solutioning and architecture efforts – from whiteboard to production
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including data scientists, analysts, and DevOps engineers
* Participate in presales, technical workshops, and customer presentations


**Your profile**
 We believe you are a senior data engineer or architect with a passion for building scalable, high-impact data solutions. You combine deep technical skills with strong communication and solutioning capabilities.
   

  

 You have:
   

  

* Proven experience designing and implementing data platforms using Databricks, Apache Spark, SQL, and Python
* Several years of hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure, including services like Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, and Azure ML
* A solid understanding of data architecture, including lakehouse design, data modeling, and governance
* Experience working in presales, technical workshops, and customer-facing presentations
* A collaborative mindset and the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions


**Databricks Champion – or on your way there**
 We are looking for someone who is either:
   

  

* An official Databricks Champion, recognized for their technical excellence and community contributions, or
* A high-level Databricks expert with the ambition and potential to become a Champion. With Capgemini’s support, network, and close partnership with Databricks, we’ll help you take that next step.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work
* hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We partner with names such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Databricks, which can equip you with valuable certifications in the latest technologies, if that is your ambition.


 SON
   

  

**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Fullstackutvecklare med kompetens inom React till samhällsviktigt uppdrag i Stockholm!
description:
Vill du ta nästa steg i karriären och samtidigt bidra till samhällsutveckling? Ta då denna unika chans att söka rollen som fullstackutvecklare hos vår kund!
   

  

 Som konsult hos Nexer får du en trygg och långsiktig anställning, samtidigt som du får möjlighet att utvecklas i uppdrag som gör skillnad. Vi tror på hållbar kompetensutveckling, balans i livet och att du ska få växa både tekniskt och som person.
   

  

**Om uppdraget**
 Vår kund är en offentlig aktör inom utbildningssektorn i Stockholm. Din roll blir att arbeta med att utveckla digitala stöd för kommunikation, bland annat externa webbplatser, intranät, söktjänster och formulärtjänster. Just nu står teamet inför ett spännande skifte där ett nytt CMS ska upphandlas och införas, samtidigt som befintliga lösningar vidareutvecklas och förvaltas. Uppdragets karaktär kräver att du kan befinna dig hos kunden minst 3 dagar/veckan.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en viktig del av teamet och bidra med din kompetens inom både frontend och backend i en molnbaserad miljö. Uppdraget är långsiktigt och samhällsviktigt - och du får vara med och påverka från start.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi tror att du är en person som trivs i team där samarbete, öppenhet och prestigelöshet är grunden för att lyckas. Du är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och gillar att ta initiativ. Du har lätt för att kommunicera och vill vara med och bygga hållbara lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av java
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av webbutveckling
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av React
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av arbete med databaser
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av API-utveckling
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av molntjänster
* God förmåga att kommunicera på svenska i både tal och skrift


**Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:**
* Microsoft Azure-tjänster som Functions, DevOps tools och KeyVault
* Cloud native-utveckling med Azures infrastruktur


 Rollen kräver att du obehindrat kan kommunicera flytande på svenska i såväl tal som skrift. Det är en förutsättning för att lyckas i våra kunddialoger och i teamet. Eftersom uppdraget är inom statlig verksamhet krävs också att du är svensk medborgare.
   

  

**Om Nexer Public Sales**
 Affärsområdet Public Sales på Nexer har länge arbetat med att driva och utveckla våra uppdrag inom offentlig sektor – myndigheter, regioner och kommuner. Nu tar vi nästa steg och skapar en ännu starkare plattform och närvaro i Mälardalsregionen. Hos oss får du inte bara arbeta med samhällsviktiga uppdrag – du får också vara med och påverka, forma kulturen och bygga upp något tillsammans med oss
   

  

**Ansökan**
**Sista ansökningsdag är 15 oktober.**
 Välkommen att söka tjänsten genom att skicka in din ansökan här nedan. Enligt GDPR hanterar vi inte ansökningar via e-post, men har du frågor om tjänsten eller Nexer är du varmt välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare, Xie Gamboa, på xie.gamboa@nexergroup.com.

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Logistics
Applikationstekniker till telekombolag
description:
**Har du några års erfarenhet inom drift och operations, och vill arbeta i en tekniskt utmanande miljö? Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med och säkerställa stabilitet, support och installationer i en befintlig plattform.**
**Att jobba som Applikationstekniker**
 Vår kund har ett stort DevOps-team som ansvarar för både utveckling och support. Samtidigt som de håller dagens plattform igång, pågår ett omfattande arbete med att bygga upp en ny plattform i leverantörers cloudmiljö, dit man så småningom kommer att migrera. Parallellt utvecklas ny infrastruktur och förberedelser inför migreringsaktiviteter nästa år. Just nu är arbetsbelastningen hög, och därför finns ett tillfälligt behov av att förstärka kapaciteten inom drift och support.
   

  

 Du blir en del av operations/teknik-teamet som ansvarar för att drifta miljöer, lägga på mjukvara och patcha servrar. Rollen innebär också supportarbete och installation i produktionsmiljön. Här får du arbeta med kända verktyg som Jira, Jenkins och Github, samtidigt som du bidrar till att upprätthålla och underhålla plattformen.
   

  

 Rollen är placerad i Sverige och kan utföras på distans. Detta är ett konsultuppdrag på 6 månader, med möjlighet till förlängning. Start är omgående.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* 2–5 års erfarenhet av operations eller applikationstekniker-roll
* Erfarenhet av drift, support och installation i servermiljöer
* Vana vid att arbeta i Linux-miljöer
* Kunskap i verktyg som Jira, Jenkins och Github ses som meriterande
* Erfarenhet av telekombranschen ses som meriterande
* Goda kunskaper i svenska eller engelska


**Ansökan**
 Låter detta som en spännande möjlighet? Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Om du har frågor, kontakta Tech Recruiter Molly Rytter på molly.rytter@nexergroup.com.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Om Nexer Tech Talent**
 Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Med över 2 500 medarbetare i 15 länder och mer än 35 års erfarenhet hjälper vi våra kunder att ligga steget före strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.

title: Senior Enterprise Architect
description:
### **START**


2025-10-20

### **SLUT**


2026-06-30

### **STAD / REMOTE**


Stockholm

### **OMFATTNING**


100%

### **UPPDRAGSBESKRIVNING**

  

We are looking for a senior Swedish speaking Enterprise Architect. The Enterprise Architect plans and designs the architecture of an enterprise. The Enterprise Architect is responsible for designing how the enterprise will function in the future and how to make sure that it is scalable, secure, and efficient. The Enterprise Architect is responsible for the design of a system and its environment, which includes all aspects from hardware to software to people. The Enterprise Architect will define standards; maintain architectures; plan for future growth; evaluate new technologies; map the relationships between information systems components (i.e., end users, business processes, applications, data, IT platform hardware/software, and networks); identify key interactions and dependencies across separate systems and platforms; plan for disaster recovery

 **Scope/Role description:**


* Lead the architecture and design of end-to-end digital platforms specific to the Energy sector.
* Drive IT Strategy for digital transformation initiatives, including the integration of IoT, energy management platforms, and renewable energy technologies.
* Architect solutions for Energy Management and Pricing Systems (EMS) ensuring scalability, performance, and security.
* Collaborate with business stakeholders, development teams, and cross-functional architects to design solutions that enable the future product portfolio.
* Implement cloud-native architectures mostly Azure, leveraging microservices for agile development and scalable solutions.
* Oversee integration of critical enterprise systems such as ERP, CRM, Data Management.
* Support digital marketing and customer experience platforms for energy providers, including the development of solutions that improve customer engagement and optimize energy usage insights for consumers.
* Drive enterprise integration projects, ensuring seamless data flows between core systems such as Energy Trading Platforms, Market Management Systems (MMS), and Billing.
* Implement agile delivery methodologies such as Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), ensuring efficient project execution and alignment with business goals.

### **KOMPETENSKRAV**

* 10+ years of experience architecting and delivering enterprise-level digital platforms, with a strong focus on the Energy sector.
* Deep expertise in Solution & Enterprise Architecture, IT Strategy, and the deployment of complex digital ecosystems.
* Proven experience designing and implementing Energy Management Systems (EMS), CRM platforms, and smart energy solutions.
* Proficiency in web application development and system integration.
* Expertise in cloud platforms (Azure), microservices architecture, API development, and containerization.
* Strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability to influence technical and business stakeholders across all levels.
* Swedish and English speaking.

### **MERITERANDE**

* Certifications in Cloud Architecture (Azure Certified Solutions Architect) or Enterprise Architecture frameworks (TOGAF).
* Expertise in Sales related Solution and processes for the Energy sector.
* Understanding of energy trading, energy sales and renewable energy sources integration

title: Konsultuppdrag | Enterprise Architect
description:
**Start: 10/20/2025**  

**End: 06/30/2026**  

**Stockholm**


We is looking for a senior Swedish speaking Enterprise Architect. The Enterprise Architect plans and designs the architecture of an enterprise. The Enterprise Architect is responsible for designing how the enterprise will function in the future and how to make sure that it is scalable, secure, and efficient. The Enterprise Architect is responsible for the design of a system and its environment, which includes all aspects from hardware to software to people. The Enterprise Architect will define standards; maintain architectures; plan for future growth; evaluate new technologies; map the relationships between information systems components (i.e., end users, business processes, applications, data, IT platform hardware/software, and networks); identify key interactions and dependencies across separate systems and platforms; plan for disaster recovery.  

  

Scope/Role description:  

  

Lead the architecture and design of end-to-end digital platforms specific to the Energy sector.  

Drive IT Strategy for digital transformation initiatives, including the integration of IoT, energy management platforms, and renewable energy technologies.  

Architect solutions for Energy Management and Pricing Systems (EMS) ensuring scalability, performance, and security.  

Collaborate with business stakeholders, development teams, and cross-functional architects to design solutions that enable the future product portfolio.  

Implement cloud-native architectures mostly Azure, leveraging microservices for agile development and scalable solutions.  

Oversee integration of critical enterprise systems such as ERP, CRM, Data Management.  

Support digital marketing and customer experience platforms for energy providers, including the development of solutions that improve customer engagement and optimize energy usage insights for consumers.  

Drive enterprise integration projects, ensuring seamless data flows between core systems such as Energy Trading Platforms, Market Management Systems (MMS), and Billing.  

Implement agile delivery methodologies such as Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), ensuring efficient project execution and alignment with business goals.  

  

Skills:
  

  

10+ years of experience architecting and delivering enterprise-level digital platforms, with a strong focus on the Energy sector.  

Deep expertise in Solution & Enterprise Architecture, IT Strategy, and the deployment of complex digital ecosystems.  

Proven experience designing and implementing Energy Management Systems (EMS), CRM platforms, and smart energy solutions.  

Proficiency in web application development and system integration.  

Expertise in cloud platforms (Azure), microservices architecture, API development, and containerization.  

Strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability to influence technical and business stakeholders across all levels.  

Swedish and English speaking.  

  

Certifications in Cloud Architecture (Azure Certified Solutions Architect) or Enterprise Architecture frameworks (TOGAF).  

Expertise in Sales related Solution and processes for the Energy sector.  

Understanding of energy trading, energy sales and renewable energy sources integration

 **Om oss**

*Senterprise är ett ledande rekryteringsbolag inom IT och en oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter. Med aktiv headhunting, search och djup teknisk förståelse hjälper vi några av Sveriges främsta arbetsgivare att hitta rätt kandidater, både för anställning och konsultuppdrag.*

*Läs vidare på* *www.senterprise.se*

title: UC Support Engineer- Belgium
description:
#### **Join Telavox as a UC Support Engineer**

**Tubeke, Belgium (near Halle)**

**Hybrid – up to 3 days remote**


At Telavox, we believe communication should be effortless.  

As a European provider of cloud-based telephony and collaboration services, we help businesses connect, collaborate, and grow. Our Benelux/France office is based in Tubize, just outside Brussels and close to Halle.


We’re now looking for a UC Support Engineer to join our team and be the technical backbone behind our UCaaS (Unified Communications as a Service) platform.


If you’re passionate about technology, problem-solving, and helping customers make the most of modern communication tools, this is your place to shine!


#### **About the job**


As a UC Support Engineer, you’ll work closely with our partners and customers to ensure our solutions run smoothly — from installation to innovation.  

  

You’ll be part of a team that values collaboration, continuous learning, and technical excellence.

#### **About you**

  

You’re a curious and hands-on problem solver who enjoys diving into new technology and helping others succeed. You think like a customer, communicate clearly, and love the challenge of troubleshooting.

 **What you bring:**

* Broad IT knowledge and a genuine interest in new technologies
* Customer-first mindset and strong analytical skills
* Understanding of IP networking, VoIP, and Unified Communications
* Organized, proactive, and always looking to improve processes

**Languages:**

* Fluent in Dutch and French – you can confidently deliver trainings in both
* Comfortable with technical English

**We offer:**

* Competitive salary (based on experience)
* Company car with fuel card
* Smartphone & SIM card
* Meal vouchers
* DKV hospital insurance
* Hybrid work setup — work from home up to 3 days per week

#### **Join us at Telavox**


Since Telavox's journey started in 2002, we have strengthened our position as the leading forward-thinking communication platform for businesses. As a digital mobile operator, we develop and own our all-in-one communication platform, which integrates telephony, PBX, messaging, meetings, and contact centers, giving businesses a smarter way to connect.  

  

Today, we’re a thriving company with 1.9 billion SEK in revenue and 500+ Telavoxers across nine countries. We embrace AI and automation to push the boundaries of business communication.  

  

We offer flexible work options and adaptable hours, giving you the freedom to balance life and career while staying connected to our vibrant Telavox culture.

### **How to apply!**

  

At Telavox, we don't focus on fitting in; we focus on making room for everyone.  

  

We’re always on the lookout for great talent, so applications are reviewed continuously. If you're ready to be part of an innovative, AI-driven telecom company, apply today with your CV and cover letter in English.

 **Learn more about what we do! ️**

title: Associate Delivery Consultant AppDev, A2C ProServe Shared Delivery (SDT)
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


The Amazon Web Services Professional Services (ProServe) team is seeking a skilled Delivery Consultant to join our team at Amazon Web Services (AWS). In this role, you'll work closely with customers to design, implement, and manage AWS solutions that meet their technical requirements and business objectives. You'll be a key player in driving customer success through their cloud journey, providing technical expertise and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.  

Possessing a deep understanding of AWS products and services, as a Delivery Consultant you will be proficient in architecting complex, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of each customer. You’ll work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, assess current infrastructure, and propose effective migration strategies to AWS. As trusted advisors to our customers, providing guidance on industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovative solutions, you will be responsible for leading the implementation process, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimizing performance, and managing risks throughout the project.
  

The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that help customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. We work together with customer teams and the AWS Partner Network (APN) to execute enterprise cloud computing initiatives. Our team provides assistance through a collection of offerings which help customers achieve specific outcomes related to enterprise cloud adoption. We also deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

As an experienced technology professional, you will be responsible for:
  

1. Designing and implementing complex, scalable, and secure AWS solutions tailored to customer needs  

2. Providing technical guidance and troubleshooting support throughout project delivery  

3. Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and propose effective migration strategies  

4. Acting as a trusted advisor to customers on industry trends and emerging technologies  

5. Sharing knowledge within the organization through mentoring, training, and creating reusable artifacts  

  

About the team  

Diverse Experiences: AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job below, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.  

Why AWS? Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.  

Inclusive Team Culture - Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.  

Mentorship & Career Growth - We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.  

Work/Life Balance - We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.


**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related field or equivalent experience
* Experience with one of the following programming languages/technologies: Java, Python, Ruby, Node.js, C, or C++
* Experience in cloud architecture and implementation

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience with source control repositories (e.g. GitHub/GitLab, SVN, Mercurial, and Perforce)
* Hands-on experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) tools, such as: Jenkins, Bamboo, and Team City
* Exposure to APIs, microservices, and distributed application architectures
* AWS experience preferred, with proficiency in a wide range of AWS services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, VPC, CloudFormation)
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences

  

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.  

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
company_description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) offers the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, with over 200 powerful services that enable our customers and our people to make more of an impact.
